description: This file contains the implementation of a Tic Tac Toe game using Streamlit for visualization. It defines the game board class, methods for making moves, checking winners, and rendering the game state and move history with HTML and CSS styling.

classes.name: TicTacToeBoard
classes.description: Represents the Tic Tac Toe game board, manages moves, checks for winners, and provides game state information.

methods.name: make_move
methods.description: Attempts to make a move at the specified row and column, updates the board, switches players, and returns success status and message.

methods.name: get_board_state
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the current game board.

methods.name: check_winner
methods.description: Checks all rows, columns, and diagonals to determine if there is a winner.

methods.name: is_board_full
methods.description: Checks if the game board is full, indicating a draw.

methods.name: get_valid_moves
methods.description: Returns a list of all empty positions where a move can be made.

methods.name: get_game_state
methods.description: Returns whether the game is over and a status message.
